inputs.name: secureFileId
inputs.label: Secure File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the certificate that was uploaded to `Secure Files` to be used to sign the given files.

inputs.name: signCertPassword
inputs.label: Secure File Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the password for the provided certificate. Use a new variable with its lock enabled on the Variables tab to encrypt this value.

inputs.name: files
inputs.label: File(s) to sign
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the file(s) you want to sign. You can use wildcards to specify multiple files ([more information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/tasks/file-matching-patterns?view=azure-devops)). For example, **/bin/*.dll for all .DLL files in the 'bin' subfolder

inputs.name: timeServer
inputs.label: Timestamp Server Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute Url of the timestamp server to use.

inputs.name: hashingAlgorithm
inputs.label: Hashing Algorithm
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file digest algorithm to use for creating file signatures (i.e. SHA256 or SHA1).

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Add a description for the file being signed
inputs.helpMarkDown: UAC will display this description when installing the signed file

inputs.name: signToolLocation
inputs.label: Path to signtool.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to singtool.
